author: psmith
msg: Added Zoom Out icon, to use with Collapse function.

author: psmith
msg: The beginnings of the refactoring of event reception and dispatching to
LogUI now implements event batch listener interface.
Eventually this will move to LogPanels implementing
this interface and receiving the event batch directly, and
LogUI only needing to deal with "new" panels.

author: psmith
msg: Factored out the Entry static inner class into it's own class

author: psmith
msg: A new interface to represent those parties that a interested
in receiving batches of events by the ChainsawAppenderHandler
Implementations can be interested in batches from all sources
or those only with a specific identifier (remote location, say).

author: psmith
msg: Changes to menus/toolbar and Log panel so that
the Logger Tree can be hidden/shown.
